body:
# My Projects
Currently I'm developing a mod called [AFM](https://github.com/aritzhack/AFM), which will include as many features as possible.

Along with it, I'm keeping this webpage updated, as the mod updates.

## [AFM](https://github.com/aritzhack/AFM)

### What is it?

[AFM](https://github.com/aritzhack/AFM) is, as stated before, a mod which will include everything I can think of. [AFM](https://github.com/aritzhack/AFM) stands for _Aritzh's First Mod_ (Not very original, I know), however, this might be a temporary name.

### Why make a Omni-mod?

It will help me make mods easily in the future. In addition, I might make some modding tutorials once [AFM](https://github.com/aritzhack/AFM) is finished, which makes me try to write the mod as cleanly as possible, so that it is easily readable.

### The Author (Me)

I (Aritz Lopez, aritzhack, aritzh) am a 16 year old boy, who loves programming and playing games (if both mixed, even better). I am from Spain, where I currently live, and I am studying computer science in high school.

### Support or Contact
Feel free to contact me in any of the following ways:
* Email: [aritzhack@gmail.com](mailto:aritzhack@gmail.com)
* Twitter: [@aritzh](https://twitter.com/aritzh)
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
name: Aritzhack's Projects
